title: Persistent notification 'Charging connected device via USB'
content:
I am seeing a persistent Android System notification: 

"Charging connected device via USB" when it is not plugged into anything. 

"USB controlled by" is set to 'connected device' even when the phone is not plugged into anything, and I cannot change this. 

The notification disappears as I charge the phone (which is also intermittent), but then reappears as soon as it's unplugged. 

I have tried charging the device from a different cable and my computer, but the problem continues.
